remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置`true`为, 如果在事件处理程序中, 你的应用程序需要更改语音识别服务的状态, 或者在语音识别服务之前更改已加载或已启用的语音识别语法处理更多输入。Set this property to `true`, if within the event handler your application needs to change the state of the speech recognition service or change the loaded or enabled speech recognition grammars before the speech recognition service processes more input. > [!NOTE] > 将属性设置为`true`会导致每个应用程序中的每个事件处理程序阻止 Windows 语音识别服务。 Setting the property to `true` causes each event handler in every application to block the Windows speech recognition service. 若要将共享识别器的更改与应用程序状态同步, 请使用方法。To synchronize the changes to the shared recognizer with your application state, use the method. 如果 为`true`, 则在执行处理程序的过程中, 语音识别服务会在新的音频输入到达时暂停和缓冲。When is `true`, during the execution of the handler the speech recognition service pauses and buffers new audio input as it arrives. 事件处理程序退出后, 语音识别服务将恢复识别并从其输入缓冲区开始处理信息。Once the event handler exits, the speech recognition service resumes recognition and starts processing information from its input buffer. 若要启用或禁用语音识别服务, 请使用属性。To enable or disable the speech recognition service, use the property.
